globalAttributes.name: localization-string
globalAttributes.description: The string to localize this element's innerHTML to (v2

values.name: CODE_PAGE_ANNOTATION_PREVIEW_INVALID_MARKUP_ERROR_MESSAGE
values.description: default: ANNOTATION FAILED RCSMPC BY USING ${A}. THIS INDICATES A MALICIOUS USE OF THE ANNOTATION TOOLS. PLEASE REPORT THIS IMMEDIATELY

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_BRACKET_STYLE_OPTION_JAVA_STYLE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Use Java-style brackets, on the same line as their block start.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_BRACKET_STYLE_OPTION_C_STYLE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Use C-style brackets, which are on a new line from their block start.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_INDENTATION_SUMMARY
values.description: default: How far to indent each block of code (e.g. function, while-loop body).

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_CODE_SPACING_OUT_OPTION_LOOSE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Loosely space the code. Includes spaces added after for and if statements.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_CODE_SPACING_OUT_OPTION_DEFAULT_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Space the code out the default amount. This option will still indent code and make newlines, but won't include extra spacing inside parentheses or spaces after for and if statements.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_CODE_SPACING_OUT_OPTION_MINIFY_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Minify the code. This will pack all of your code onto one line and try to make it as small as possible. It also removes all comments. This will not work fully in some languages, such as Python.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_EXPRESSION_SPACING_OPTION_ADD_SPACES_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Add spaces inside expressions and between arguments.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_EXPRESSION_SPACING_OPTION_DEFAULT_TO_CODE_SPACING_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Default to using Code Spacing configuration inside expressions and between arguments.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_COMMENTS_OPTION_REMOVE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Remove comments from the code completely

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_RICH_FORMATTING_OPTION_PARSE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Parse, analyze, and color the code. This allows features like explainations and automatic refactoring.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_RICH_FORMATTING_OPTION_DONT_PARSE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Don't tokenize and color the code. This will speed up loading times and make the code viewer more performant, but removes features like explainations. This will override most other options.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_PAIRED_CHARACTERS_OPTION_HIGHLIGHT_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Highlight the counterpart of paired characters (like (, [, or {) when you hover over them.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_PAIRED_CHARACTERS_OPTION_DONT_HIGHLIGHT_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Don't highlight the counterpart of paired characters (like (, [, or {) when you hover over them.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_REGISTER_VARIABLE_SCOPES_OPTION_DONT_REGISTER_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Don't register variables. This can save memory and make the code viewer faster, but removes features like variable definition finding and some refactoring features.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_REGISTER_VARIABLE_SCOPES_OPTION_REGISTER_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Register variables. This option will use an internal object to record variables used in the program and link variable usages to their definitions.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_IF_ELSE_FORMAT_OPTION_NEXT_LINE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: The else should be on a new line from its if's ending bracket.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_IF_ELSE_FORMAT_OPTION_SAME_LINE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: The else should be on the same line as its if's ending bracket.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_SINGLE_STATEMENT_BLOCKS_OPTION_ALWAYS_NEWLINE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Single-statement blocks should always have curly brackets.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_SINGLE_STATEMENT_BLOCKS_OPTION_NEVER_NEWLINE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Single-statement blocks should never have curly brackets.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_SINGLE_STATEMENT_BLOCKS_OPTION_DEFAULT_NEWLINE_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Just leave it however the example code was written.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_LINE_WRAP_OPTION_WRAP_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Wrap long lines to keep the display narrower. This only affects how code is displayed-- if you copy it, your clipboard copy won't have the wrap.

values.name: CODE_PAGE_TOOLS_FORMAT_SETTINGS_SETTING_LINE_WRAP_OPTION_SCROLL_SIDEWAYS_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Scroll sideways instead of wrapping lines

values.name: HOMEPAGE_HERO_SUBTITLE
values.description: default: Easy help on AP Computer Science

values.name: HOMEPAGE_SOCIAL_PROOF_CARDS_AVERAGE_USER_SCORE_LABEL
values.description: default:  Average User AP CS Score

values.name: HOMEPAGE_WHY_MAKE_THIS_SITE_CODEHS_HAS_GAPS_CONTENT
values.description: default: For students who naturally understand computer science, CodeHS is great! Not all of us are like that, though.

values.name: HOMEPAGE_WHY_MAKE_THIS_SITE_HARD_TO_UNDERSTAND_CONTENT
values.description: default: If you don't get the right solution on the first time, it is hard to ever arrive at the right solution. Auto-graders offer generic tips that almost never work. At the same time, autograders require exactly the correct output in order to pass the task.

values.name: HOMEPAGE_WHY_MAKE_THIS_SITE_THEYRE_NOT_BAD_CONTENT
values.description: default: CodeHS is definitely 'better' than this site, because they're also more general. They've tutorials on 9 - 14 languages (depending on how you define a 'language'), at all levels. We get frusturated sometimes, but CodeHS is incredible, to be honest!

values.name: HOMEPAGE_WHY_MAKE_THIS_SITE_BUT_THIS_CAN_FOCUS_TITLE
values.description: default: but this can be more focused

values.name: HOMEPAGE_WHY_MAKE_THIS_SITE_BUT_THIS_CAN_FOCUS_CONTENT
values.description: default: This is not a competitor to CodeHS. It's a companion & a helper site, designed to help you out on confusing assignments. In addition, this site has explanations for how to do the challenges. It helps CodeHS to not be such a just-test-until-you-pass environment by working for the students, not just the teachers.

values.name: HOMEPAGE_WHY_MAKE_THIS_SITE_AND_HELP_STUDENTS_CONTENT
values.description: default: We take pride in being able to help students with every question, because we're students ourselves. If you have a question or something you're confused about, feel free to ask on our Discord or over email!

values.name: CODEHS_LANGUAGE_INDEX_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Below are all ${A} CodeHS lessons on this site. Only exercises are included, so you won't see any videos, examples, or tests-- if you are confused by an example, feel free to ask in the Discord!

values.name: ERROR_ALMANAC_INDEX_SUMMARY
values.description: default: Some common errors on CodeHS are hard to pin down and fix. To aid with those, here are some easy solutions.

values.name: REPORT_BUG_SUMMARY
values.description: default: You can report bugs through this Google Form, email at bug-report@dinnercodingtime.com, or through the Discord in the #cs channel

values.name: REPORT_BUG_TIME_DISCLAIMER
values.description: default: Everyone working on this is an AP student too, so we might take a bit to respond to bug reports. Don't worry, though, we'll be sure to get to them!
